feed.title: PoeticMetric Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for PoeticMetric: v1.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add self hosted installation guide to docs by @th0th in https://github.com/th0th/poeticmetric/pull/189
  • Update dependencies by @th0th in https://github.com/th0th/poeticmetric/pull/190
  • Fix the missing google client id issue by @th0th in https://github.com/th0th/poeticmetric/pull/192
  • Update all dependencies by @th0th in https://github.com/th0th/poeticmetric/pull/193

Full Changelog: https://github.com/th0th/poeticmetric/compare/v1.0.0-beta3...v1.0.0
